description: This file implements the main Tic Tac Toe game component for a web app using the Qwik framework. It includes game logic for player moves, AI opponent logic, state management, and UI rendering.

methods.name: checkWinner
methods.description: Determines if there is a winner or a draw based on the current board state.

methods.name: postAiMove
methods.description: Updates the game state after the AI makes a move, checking for win/draw conditions.

methods.name: resetBoard
methods.description: Resets the game board and updates the starting player for fairness.

methods.name: setMode
methods.description: Sets the game mode to either local or AI mode, resetting the game.

methods.name: handleCellClick
methods.description: Handles user clicks on the game board cells, updating the game state accordingly.

methods.name: aiMove
methods.description: Executes an AI move based on simple heuristic strategies (win, block, center, random).

methods.name: getCellLabel
methods.description: Provides ARIA labels for cells based on their row and column.

methods.name: cellClass
methods.description: Determines CSS classes for cells based on their state and if they are part of a winning line.
